data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Fernando Madrigal of Queretaro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM are caught offside.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Queretaro takes a corner from the right.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Queretaro's Jonathan Betancourt is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, Oscar Mejia Garcia has awarded Queretaro a corner.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 10, Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Queretaro takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 10, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro drives forward and Fernando Madrigal gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 14, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Queretaro.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 18, Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Jero Rodriguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Oscar Mejia Garcia has awarded Pumas UNAM a corner.
Luis Quintana's header is off-target for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Queretaro.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Queretaro.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 24, Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro's Omar Islas misses with an attempt on goal.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Pumas UNAM are whistled for offside.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 37, Queretaro needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 40, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 42, Queretaro pushes forward through Angel Sepulveda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Pumas UNAM takes a corner from the left.
Juan Dinenno scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Nicolas Freire to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Alan Mozo is replacing Luis Quintana for the home team.
Queretaro make their first substitution with Omar Arellano replacing Francisco Rivera.
In the minute 47, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Kevin Ramirez is on a sub for Jonathan Betancourt for Queretaro.
Free kick Queretaro.
Favio Alvarez of Pumas UNAM smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia has awarded Pumas UNAM a corner.
In the minute 53, Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Queretaro's half?
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Alfonso Luna Queretaro.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Nicolas Freire has the misfortune to make it 1-1 through an own goal.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
The home team replace Favio Alvarez with Juan Iturbe.
In the minute 67, Own goal! Daniel Cervantes scores in his own net to make it 2-1.
Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 69, Queretaro are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Javier Ibarra is on a sub for Kevin Escamilla for Queretaro.
Pumas UNAM will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Queretaro.
Angel Sepulveda levels the score at 2-2.
In the minute 74, Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Juan Dinenno puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
In the minute 82, Carlos Gutierrez with an assist there.
Bryan Mendoza is replacing Carlos Gutierrez for the home team.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro make their fourth substitution with Irving Zurita replacing Omar Islas.
The home team replace Jero Rodriguez with Alejandro Mayorga.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Free kick Queretaro.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 89, Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Mexico City.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Queretaro drives forward and Angel Sepulveda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Juan Iturbe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Queretaro.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Andres Iniestra (Pumas UNAM) gets a yellow card.
He's off! Andres Iniestra is shown a red card.
